title: Aadujeevitham: The Goat Life (Hindi)
short_cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran, K. R. Gokul, Jimmy Jean-Louis, Amala Paul, Talib Al Balushi, Shobha Mohan, Rik Aby, Robin Das
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran, K. R. Gokul, Jimmy Jean-Louis, Amala Paul, Talib Al Balushi, Shobha Mohan, Rik Aby, Robin Das

desc: An Indian man seeking work follows a job lead to Saudi Arabia, only to find himself forced to labor without pay as a goat herder in the remote desert.
